Encoding.HelpMesg: Use this menu to open an item in the Apple Menu Items folder or to display the IconEdit about box.
Displays the HyperMandella version number and a copyright notice.
Use this menu to close windows or quit.
Creates a new untitled document window.
Opens a saved HyperMandella document.
Duplicates the frontmost fractal window. Disabled because there are no fractal windows.
Closes the frontmost window.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Closes the frontmost window. Disabled because there are no windows.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Saves the frontmost document window.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Saves the frontmost document window. Not available because the document hasn't been changed or there are no document windows.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Saves the frontmost document window under a new name.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Saves the frontmost document window under a new name. Not available because there are no document windows.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Removes any changes you've made to the document since saving it.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Removes any changes you've made to the document since saving it. Not available because the document hasn't been saved or changed.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Quits HyperMandella.
Use this menu to undo/redo actions or to perform editing operations.
Reverses your last action.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Reverses your last action. Disabled because you haven't done anything that can be undone.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Re-performs your last action after it has been undone.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Re-performs your last action after it has been undone. Disabled because you haven't selected Undo yet.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Copies the selection to the clipboard and deletes the selection.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Copies the selection to the clipboard and deletes the selection. Not available because there isn't a selection or the fractal is selected.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Copies the selection to the clipboard.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Copies the selection to the clipboard. Not available because there isn't a selection.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Replaces the selection with the contents of the clipboard.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Replaces the selection with the contents of the clipboard. Not available because there is no selection or the fractal is selected.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Deletes the selection.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Deletes the selection. Not available because there is no selection or the fractal is selected.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Selects everything.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Selects everything. Not available because everything is already selected or there isn't a window with selectable content.

Encoding.HelpMesg: A dialog allowing you to set the default window size and the number of colors.
Use this menu to change the parameters that affect the way the fractal is computed.
The fourth component of the 4D point the fractal formula starts with.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: The fourth component of the 4D point the fractal formula starts with. Not available because there isn't a fractal window open.

Encoding.HelpMesg: The constant used in the 4D Julia equation.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: The constant used in the 4D Julia equation. Not available because there isn't a fractal window open.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Another constant used by a few of the fractal formulas.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Another constant used by a few of the fractal formulas. Not available because there isn't a fractal window open.

Encoding.HelpMesg: If the magnitude of the 4D point in the fractal formula exceeds this value it is outside the fractal.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: If the magnitude of the 4D point in the fractal formula exceeds this value it is outside the fractal. Not available because there isn't a fractal window open.

Encoding.HelpMesg: The maximum number of times to iterate the fractal formula for a point.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: The maximum number of times to iterate the fractal formula for a point. Not available because there isn't a fractal window open.

Encoding.HelpMesg: The dimensions of the fractal image (in pixels).
Encoding.DisabledHelp: The dimensions of the fractal image (in pixels). Not available because there isn't a fractal window open.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Makes the current fractal's settings the ones switched in when changing the fractal formula.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Makes the current fractal's settings the ones switched in when changing the fractal formula. Not available because there isn't a fractal window open.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Use this menu to change the parameters that affect the way the fractal is colored and lighted.
Lights a fractal using ambient and diffuse light.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Lights a fractal using ambient and diffuse light. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Like the Lambert shader except that it also uses specular highlights.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Like the Lambert shader except that it also uses specular highlights. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: A scaling factor that is multiplied to the contribution from an ambient light. This should normally be between 0 and 1.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: A scaling factor that is multiplied to the contribution from an ambient light. This should normally be between 0 and 1. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: A scaling factor that is multiplied to the diffuse contribution from point lights. This should normally be between 0 and 1.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: A scaling factor that is multiplied to the diffuse contribution from point lights. This should normally be between 0 and 1. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: A scaling factor that is multiplied to the specular contribution from point lights. This should normally be between 0 and 1.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: A scaling factor that is multiplied to the specular contribution from point lights. This should normally be between 0 and 1. Not available because the Phong Shader isn't selected or there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: A number that controls the size of the specular highlights. Larger numbers reduce the size of the highlighted region.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: A number that controls the size of the specular highlights. Larger numbers reduce the size of the highlighted region. Not available because the Phong Shader isn't selected or there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: A light with a location that casts a shadow.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: A light with a location that casts a shadow. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: A light with a location that casts a shadow.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: A light with a location that casts a shadow. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: A light with a location that casts a shadow.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: A light with a location that casts a shadow. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: A light with a location that casts a shadow.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: A light with a location that casts a shadow. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Use this menu to change the parameters that affect the location the fractal is viewed from.
Rotates the camera around the y-axis so that it spins left.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Rotates the camera around the y-axis so that it spins left. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Rotates the camera around the y-axis so that it spins right.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Rotates the camera around the y-axis so that it spins right. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Rotates the camera around the x-axis so that it spins upwards.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Rotates the camera around the x-axis so that it spins upwards. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Rotates the camera around the x-axis so that it spins downwards.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Rotates the camera around the x-axis so that it spins downwards. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Rotates the camera around the x-axis so that it spins clockwise.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Rotates the camera around the x-axis so that it spins clockwise. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Rotates the camera around the x-axis so that it spins counter-clockwise.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Rotates the camera around the x-axis so that it spins counter-clockwise. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Moves the camera closer to the fractal.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Moves the camera closer to the fractal. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Moves the camera away from the fractal.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Moves the camera away from the fractal. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Moves the camera left.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Moves the camera left. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Moves the camera right.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Moves the camera right. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Moves the camera up.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Moves the camera up. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Moves the camera down.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Moves the camera down. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Various parameters affecting the point from which the fractal is viewed.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Various parameters affecting the point from which the fractal is viewed. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Use this menu to change the colors used by a fractal.
Adds the palette in the frontmost fractal window to the Palette menu.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Adds the palette in the frontmost fractal window to the Palette menu. Not available because there isn't a fractal window or the palette is already in the Palette menu.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Deletes a palette from the Palette menu.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Deletes a palette from the Palette menu. Not available because there are no palettes left.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Use this menu to save or change the front window's palette.
Randomizes the front window's palette.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Randomizes the front window's palette. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Brings up a dialog allowing you to tweak the Random Palette command.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Brings up a dialog allowing you to tweak the Random Palette command. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Adds the front window's palette to the next open number key (command-digit causes that temp palette to be used in the fractal).
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Adds the front window's palette to the next open number key. Not available because there is no fractal window or all the number keys are in use.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Removes all the temp palettes from the number keys.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Removes all the temp palettes from the number keys. Not available because there is no fractal window or there are no temp palettes.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Misc debugging tools.
Use this submenu to select the formula that is used to compute the fractal.
Use this submenu to select the formula that is used to compute the fractal.
Use this submenu to control the amount by which the rotate commands rotate.
Use this submenu to control the amount by which the rotate commands rotate.
Use this submenu to control the amount by which the zoom commands zoom.
Use this submenu to control the amount by which the zoom commands zoom.
Use this submenu to change the formula used when computing the color of the fractal.
Use this submenu to change the formula used when computing the color of the fractal.
Allows you to change the current color formula.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Allows you to change the current color formula. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Adds the current color formula to the menu.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Adds the current color formula to the menu. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Allows you to remove a color formula from the menu.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Allows you to remove a color formula from the menu. Not available because there isn't a fractal window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Use this submenu to control the amount by which the pan commands pan.
Use this submenu to control the amount by which the pan commands pan.
